pullRequest.title: Add add-exports to JEP358NPEMessageTests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add --add-exports to JEP358NPEMessageTests to fix illegal-access error
Issue: #11419

[skip ci]
Signed-off-by: Longyu Zhang longyu.zhang@ibm.com

nodes.bodyText:
Can we keep the references to jdk internal ASM to avoid updating external asm.jar file later?
A workaround for IllegalAccessError could be something like --add-exports java.base/jdk.internal.org.objectweb.asm=ALL-UNNAMED.

beforeCommit.message:
Update JEP358NPEMessageTests classpath and package name
- Add asm jar path in playlist
- Change asm package name to fix EP358NPEMessageTests failure for jdk 16

[skip ci]
Signed-off-by: Longyu Zhang <longyu.zhang@ibm.com>
